Received: from KSLawdogg@... by csimo02.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v26.7.) id a.5a.4f2e517 (4240) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Tue, 9 May 2000 20:55:22 -0400 (EDT)
Message-ID: <5a.4f2e517.264a0d7a@...>
Date: Tue, 9 May 2000 20:55:22 EDT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 101
From: KSLawdogg@...

The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Stinkbomb/Ramhorn/Manterror/Injector:



::Nemesis raised his laser rifle, adding a scope, he got the crosshairs right 
on Iron Raptor's left optic, when suddenly he felt a sharp pain and fell 
forward, Kit's attack nearly blowing his head off::
"beast mode..." (He whispered, going to his bat mode and flying into the 
protection of a tree::

::Dark One heard Zardus' orders::
-Hmmm...an unknown transmission from an unknown person...I'll have to deal 
with it later- (he thought to himself)
"Oblitercons, fall back!  The day is ours!" ::Dark One opened fire with 
explosive rounds, firing out fifty explosive shells at the Ark, the clip 
sliding out automatically, Dark One replacing it::

::Scavenger fires his last missile off at the Ark, replacing his missile 
launcher with a chain gun loaded with armor-piercing shells, firing a dozen 
rounds off at Teltoli, running towards the Alliance Base::

::Breakdown fired a grenade off at Dracona (which somehow got to the 
battlezone without posting an e-mail about it...cough, cough), then running 
off after Scavenger::

::Pyro fired a burst of flames off at Dracona, turning he saw Stinkbomb on 
the edge, a few dozen sonic shells sending him hitting the ground, mech-fluid 
leaking from his chest, Pyro transformed to his his black dragon mode::
"Die!" ::A burst of flames sent Stinkbomb tumbling down the 60 ft ledge:: 
::Flapping his wings, Pyro went into the air towards the Alliance base::

::Hiss fired a few pot shots at Injector after yelling in pain at being shot 
by Injector, then one at Dracona, he transformed to his rattlesnake mode and 
slithered away towards home base::

::Nemesis saw everyone retreating and lifted into the air, dive bombing, 
slashing his claws at Teltoli's left optic, flying off towards the Alliance 
base::

-----------------

::Manterror fired two ion disks at Teltoli, running forward and kicking a 
snake going through the battlefield, the snake slithering away::


::The fuzor, Injector, yelled as a fusion blast caught him in the side, the 
fuzor gripping the damaged side::
::Injector fired three stinger missiles at the Ark, then one off at Zardus::
"The fall of the Alliance is now!"
